QuestData.Title: Kua'fon's Day Off
QuestData.Description:
You know, I think Kua'fon might be lonely when you are not here.
What makes me say that? Well, I got a very angry scroll from a Tortollan indicating he was stealing shiny things from their stalls, but that could mean anything.
You should probably stop him before he damages your reputation, hm?
<Wingminder Goja cackles.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Stop Kua'fon from being a nuisance in the Port of Zandalar.
